Kelly Marie Tran did not take becoming a Disney Princess lightly.

articles.title: Hilaria Baldwin pumps milk while husband Alec tackles dishes… after welcoming baby number SIX - Daily Mail
articles.description: Hilaria Baldwin recently  announced the arrival of her SIXTH child, daughter Lucia, with husband Alec, just six months after giving birth to their son Eduardo.

articles.title: 'The Voice': Kelly Clarkson hits back after Blake Shelton says she doesn’t 'have time' for show - USA TODAY
articles.description: Blake Shelton said Kelly Clarkson "doesn’t really have time for this" while juggling "The Kelly Clarkson Show." He added that she "forgot her roots."
articles.content:
The judges on NBC's "The Voice" are not holding back this season, including veterans Blake Shelton and Kelly Clarkson.
